code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{addInCart}from'../redux/slice/cartSlice';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Rightproduct(){var ans=useSelector(state=>state.filter.categoryValue);const[product,setProduct]=useState([]);const dispatch=useDispatch();useEffect(()=>{var apiPath=ans==''?'https://fakestoreapi.com/products/':"https://fakestoreapi.com/products/category/".concat(ans);fetch(apiPath).then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>{setProduct(data);});},[ans]);const handleAddToCart=item=>{dispatch(addInCart(item));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"rightBg",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"All Product"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row mt-4",children:product&&product.map(val=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-3 boxPro",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"productItem",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:val.image,className:"img-fluid"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"title",children:val.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"PriceName",children:["Rs.",val.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn",onClick:()=>handleAddToCart(val),children:"Add to Cart"})]})}))})]});}
